Wiredcraft | Berlin, Chengdu, Shanghai, Shenzhen, Wuhan | Remote, Visa, Full-time or Intern | https://wiredcraft.com

We help the largest organizations in the world create and grow digital products for tens of millions of users. We've built the software running the elections of Myanmar, maintain the mobile apps for Starbucks in China and maintain a payment solution for the Chinese market.

We keep our tech chops sharp (Node.js, React, Python, Golang, Ansible, Docker...) and contribute heavily to Open Source.

We value transparency, self-improvement and getting things done (and write about it all on our playbook [1]).

We're growing fast and recruiting across the board [2], in particular:

- Javascript Front-end Developers (https://wiredcraft.com/jobs/front-end-developer/)

- Backend Developers (https://wiredcraft.com/jobs/backend-developer/)

- iOS & Android Developers (https://wiredcraft.com/jobs/android-ios-developer/)

- DevOps (https://wiredcraft.com/jobs/devops/)

1: http://playbook.wiredcraft.com/article/culture/

2: https://wiredcraft.com/jobs/
